welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dedham, United States! Get ready to experience the charm and history this beautiful city is known for. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all that Dedham has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Logan International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Logan International Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The international terminal at Logan International Airport, offering flights to destinations around the world.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Central Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at North Central Airport serves flights to nearby cities and towns.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
